com.ctb.bean.request
Class PageParams

java.lang.Object
  com.ctb.bean.request.PageParams
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PageParams
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Contains paging parameters, which are applied to the data set returned by a platform call to produce a single page of a result list

Author:
Nate_Cohen
See Also:

Constructor Detail

PageParams

public PageParams(int pageRequested,
                  int pageSize,
                  int maxPages)
Creates a paging parameter set

Parameters:
pageRequested - - the page of data to return
pageSize - - the number of items on each page
maxPages - - the maximum number of pages to obtain from data store
